column4: Duration of the process  [Both: Real or simulated process] Note: It is used for batch process and not for continuously running process.The standard of ISO 8601 is followed. Example: [dateX][“T”][timeX][“/”][dateX][“T”][timeX]
process operation as per ISO15926-4 (z.B: Mixing,pumping,filtering,etc)
A flux of energy/info/material that flows from source to destination (as per ISO159126) (eg:Material Flow)
Categorization of process if it is simulation based or Real process (eg: true)
Time taken for Computation of the simulated process.
Name of the Simulated Process. (eg. Simulation 1)
Information about how to calculate KPI or link to the model
